game.name: Wothan The Barbarian
game.description:
One of the best adventure games to play for boys, Wothan The Barbarian is an extremely popular free online gaming activity. In this intensely fun game, you have to help your hero to escape from the castle dungeon. Be careful while dodging those nasty traps and watching out for the unwanted obstacles and hurdles on your way. In this cool escaping game, your task is to help your hero from a number of lurking dangers that will threaten him. 

The heinous Zianous, an evil creature, has captured the most hilarious and popular barbarian in Frooboria ? Wothan. In this flash game, you will have to perform the job of helping him to find his way out of bound by chains.  When you play this latest adventure game, you would get a chance to enter into an environment filled up with lots of excitement and thrill. Beat all the obstacles coming on your way with your confidence and let help your hero to reach the exit gate. 

Inspiring from the feeling of her evilness, Zianous wants to end Wothan after chaining him to the dungeon walls. Since Wothan is powerful enough to break the strong chains and starts putting the efforts to escape from there. In this user-friendly free online game, you will serve as a friend of Wothan by helping to keep him as far as possible from the dropping spikes. All the best for huge fun!
